snippet.title: Cards of Ethernity - Early Access Teaser
snippet.description:
Cards of Ethernity is a high-quality collectible card game (CCG) set in the dark fantasy universe of Aether. Players use a variety of Adventurers, Creatures and Cards, each with their own unique mechanics, to craft powerful new strategies. 

Players quest for new cards and battle each other for ranks and rewards, all while customizing their decks and cards to suit their individual playstyles. With real-time online battles, deep strategy, and expansive card sets, Cards of Ethernity offers an immersive and rewarding gaming experience. 

By combining elements of card collecting and deck building, the game allows players to explore the world of Aether and craft powerful new strategies. As they progress, players will also unlock powerful new cards and mechanics, and can customize their decks with specific abilities and playstyles. With its engaging combat system and real-time online battles, Cards of Ethernity offers an exciting and rewarding gaming experience.

Collect. Explore. Conquer.
https://coe.gg/

MINIMUM:
OS: Windows 10 Home 64 Bit
Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590 or similar
Memory: 16 GB RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2060 6GB or equivalent
DirectX: Version 11
Network: Broadband Internet connection
Storage: 20 GB available space
Sound Card: any DirectX Compatible

RECOMMENDED:
OS: Windows 11 Home 64 Bit
Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-11600 or similar
Memory: 32 GB RAM
Graphics: Nvidia GTX 3060 Ti 6GB or equivalent
DirectX: Version 11
Network: Broadband Internet connection
Storage: 20 GB available space
Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

Play for Free: https://coe.gg/download
Join us: 
- https://discord.gg/AetherGames
- https://twitter.com/AetherGamesInc

Discord - https://discord.gg/DubAxN6bSb
Twitter - https://twitter.com/AetherGamesInc
